name: Just Your Ordinary School Life Simulator (A Visual Novel)
name_original: Just Your Ordinary School Life Simulator (A Visual Novel)
description:
A cast of visual novel characters realizes that they’re trapped in a video game. Our brave genderless Protagonist must team up with his friends (the Amnesia Club) and other rogue Characters to overtake the President and gain control of the game. But is it even possible to outmaneuver the very Character who controls everything?

  • Multiple choices and endings.
  • Stat-based gameplay: intelligence, charisma, athleticism.
  • Friendship levels which affect dialogue and in-game events.
  • RPG battle sequences.
  • Risk of death!

Written by Uncle Moose

Art and Music by ChiefZika

https://soundcloud.com/chiefzika

https://chiefzika.bandcamp.com/

See the game for full credits. Thanks for checking our stuff out!

Planned Updates:

  • Bug fixes and patches.
  • Lengthening the game (more choices, scenes, story beats).
  • Asset and UI clean up (re-draw of side character assets, UI revamp).
  • Replacing the title (replacing the main menu image with a more interactive sequence).
  • Adding more SFX, VFX,  and miscellaneous assets.
  • Adding Kinetic Text.

Future Plans (depending on the game's outreach):

  • Custom Backgrounds and More Music
  • CG Scenes and Gallery
  • Steam, Google Play, App Store Versions
  • Web/Online Version
  • UI and Code Overhaul
  • Voice Acting

Please consider checking out our Patreon for specifics regarding future plans!
